Rule: {REF2("TENOR") in ['0.5Y', '1Y', '3Y', '5Y', '10Y'] if REF2("RISK_TYPE") in ['Risk_Credit'] else True}
{REF2("TENOR") in ['1Y', '2Y', '5Y', '10Y', '30Y'] if (REF2("RISK_TYPE") in ['Risk_IRCurve'] and REF2("QUALIFIER") in ['USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'AUD', 'CAD', 'SEK', 'JPY']) else True}

If RISK_TYPE in [Risk_Equity, Risk_EquityVol] then BUCKET to be integer in [1 - 13]
If RISK_TYPE in [Risk_Commodity, Risk_CommodityVol] then BUCKET to be integer in [1 - 11]
